meanings.definition: The quality or state of being taut.
meanings.sent1: The tautness of the rope kept the flag flying high.
meanings.sent2: The tautness of the drum skin produced a clear sound.
meanings.sent3: The tautness of the trampoline made jumping even more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her voice carried a tautness that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The tautness of the sail filled with wind signaled a smooth sail ahead.

meanings.sent1: The tautness of the rubber band made it ready to snap.
meanings.sent2: The tautness of the wire fence kept the animals in the field.
meanings.sent3: The tautness of the fabric made sewing a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The tautness of the guitar string created a melodious tune.
meanings.sent5: The tautness of the balloon indicated it was close to bursting.
